BNC User Reference Guide

<stage>

stage (stage direction) contains any kind of stage direction within a dramatic text or fragment.
Class att.rendered model.stageLike
Declaration 
element stage { att.rendered.attribute.rend, macro.paraContent }
Attributes
(Global attributes and those inherited from [att.rendered ] )
Example
 <stage
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <s n="8004">
   <w c5="DT0" hw="several" pos="ADJ">Several </w>
   <w c5="AJ0" hw="hon." pos="ADJ">Hon. </w>
   <w c5="NN2" hw="member" pos="SUBST">Members </w>
   <w c5="VVD" hw="rise" pos="VERB">rose</w>
  </s>
 </stage>
; ;
Module core
